JobFullDesc: Facebook is looking for a leader to manage a high-performing client-facing team of engineers. As a Director of Commerce, you will lead the commerce industry by building new solutions and enabling business partners to realize the full potential of those solutions while also leading and managing multiple global teams of Solutions Engineers. The Commerce teams within Solutions Engineering focus on building new experiences across multiple cross-functional teams and driving value for sellers, buyers, creators and technology partners. You will balance building a vision and inspiring a large team of Solutions Engineers, influencing cross-functional sales and product leadership, and people management. This role will allow you to apply technical problem-solving, leading and consulting clients and partners on creating and executing a business strategy, leading multiple teams of engineers, and growing
